title: Roast pheasant and bread sauce
description: Try to order your pheasants from a butcher that has hung them for a minimum of 6-7 days. Look for a rich, soft and fruity wine to serve - say a Pinot Noir from the Côte de Nuits, or one of the very good wines from Oregon.
ingredients: 2 pheasants (800-900g/1lb 12oz-2lb each), oven-ready, preferably hen pheasants
50ml/2fl oz rapeseed oil (or other non-scented oil)
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 slice white bread, broken into pieces
